title: the go.exe returns none under windows
body:
Please answer these questions before submitting your issue. Thanks!

1. What version of Go are you using (`go version`)?
I installed a stable release of go1.6.3 on my windows. However, i execute 'go version' under the cmd.exe as administrator.

2. What operating system and processor architecture are you using (`go env`)?
my development environment is  the windows7 enterprise. 

3. What did you do?
If possible, provide a recipe for reproducing the error.
A complete runnable program is good.
A link on play.golang.org is best.

actually, i had ever built projects written using golang. But i cannot use it after my pc joined into an domain of my company. I tried 'go version' 'go help'... etc, but it cannot returns any words.
I am sure that GOROOT and GOPATH is set.
Therefore, I can only launch the remote Linux(CentOS 7.1) machine and upload my project code to build my project.
